title: Drizzlepath (2015) PC | RePack by Azaq
description:
============================================
Drizzlepath (2015) PC | RePack by Azaq
============================================

Languages: ENGLISH

============================================
Description: =
============================================

In Drizzlepath you are set on a journey to the top of the Mountain of
Fire. This game is what you'd call a "walking simulator". It aims to be
an atmospheric, relaxed and enigmatic experience. It was made in
CryEngine 3 to achieve an immersive graphic quality. If you enjoy games
that are about the experience of discovering of the world around you
you will probably love Drizzlepath

============================================
RePack Details:                            =
============================================

- Nothing was ripped
- Video is in it's original bitrate
- Based on original release
- Install time 3 min
- RePack by Azaq

============================================
Instruction: =
============================================

1. Install the game
2. Play
